sqlList.sql: select lower(table_name) table_name from user_all_tables where table_name = upper(:table_name)
select lower(column_name) from all_cons_columns a, all_constraints b where a.constraint_name = b.constraint_name and b.constraint_type = 'P' and b.table_name = upper(:table_name)
select lower(table_name) table_name,lower(column_name) column_name,lower(data_type) data_type from user_tab_columns where table_name = upper(:table_name)
select b.organiseid,b.organisename from t_organise b where b.organiseid in ( select distinct parentid from t_organise a )
select a.organiseid, a.organisename from t_organise a where a.parentid = :parentid
select b.organisename from t_organise b where b.organisename like '%'|| :organisename ||'%'
select a.menuid, a.menuname from t_menu a where a.fatherid is null
select a.menuid,a.menuname from t_menu a where a.fatherid = :fatherid
select a.buttonid,a.buttonname from t_button a where a.menuid = :menuid
